name: polybius 6
description:
(Game made by me and the people who made polybius game real (real))

A game with real polybius sprites (real) full with fun and "entertainment" :))))))

YOU PLAY AS CRAFT SPACE and he needs your help! he needs to kill evil sinister monsters that enter throughout the world!!!!! (this game requiters keyboard and mouse) to play the video game.

OVER 12 levels to explore!!!! and real entertainment if you press download with the mouse on your computer :)

(WARNING)

This game is bad and may mess your little baby head right up! be careful
